books.title: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: Bob Woodward
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist interviews the former president. Read by Donald J. Trump and the author. 11 hours, 29 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE TRUMP TAPES

books.author: Gabor Maté with Daniel Maté
books.contributor: by Gabor Maté with Daniel Maté
books.description: The potential ways in which trauma and stress from modern-day living can affect our physical health. Read by Daniel Maté. 18 hours, 13 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE MYTH OF NORMAL

books.author: Jon Meacham
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning biographer portrays the life of Abraham Lincoln. Read by the author. 17 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.
books.title: AND THERE WAS LIGHT

books.author: Viola Davis
books.description: The multiple award-winning actress describes the difficulties she encountered before claiming her sense of self and achieving professional success. Read by the author. 9 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: FINDING ME

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Quentin Tarantino
books.description: The filmmaker shares his love of cinema with special attention given to key American films of the 1970s. Read by Edoardo Ballerini and the author. 10 hours, 9 minutes unabridged.
books.title: CINEMA SPECULATION

books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species. Read by Derek Perkins. 15 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: SAPIENS

books.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: The astrophysicist and director of the Hayden Planetarium delves into subjects including politics, religion, gender and race. Read by the author. 7 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: STARRY MESSENGER

books.author: Bruce D. Perry and Oprah Winfrey
books.contributor: by Bruce D. Perry and Oprah Winfrey
books.description: An approach to dealing with trauma that shifts an essential question used to investigate it. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 27 minutes unabridged.
books.title: WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU?

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The fourth book in the Cat Kid Comic Club series. After doing their chores, baby frogs work together to create more mini-comics.
books.title: COLLABORATIONS

books.author: Aaron Blabey
books.description: The 16th book in the Bad Guys series. An oversharing bat and a guy with a mullet add to the weirdness.
books.title: THE BAD GUYS IN THE OTHERS?!

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The third book in the Cat Kid Comic Club series. Fame, fortune and creativity pull the members of the comic club in different directions.
books.title: ON PURPOSE

books.author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
books.description: A poor young man who was betrayed by someone he once trusted discovers he has the power of a devil inside him.
books.title: CHAINSAW MAN, VOL. 1

books.author: Ann M. Martin.
books.contributor: by Ann M. Martin. Illustrated by Chan Chau
books.description: The 12th book in the Baby-sitters Club graphic novel series. Jessi uses sign language with her charge.
books.title: JESSI'S SECRET LANGUAGE

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The 10th book in the Dog Man series. Can the power of love overcome the darkness and despair created by new villains?
books.title: MOTHERING HEIGHTS

books.author: Steve Martin.
books.contributor: by Steve Martin. Illustrated by Harry Bliss
books.description: An illustrated memoir detailing Martin’s time as an actor, comedian, banjo player and more.
books.title: NUMBER ONE IS WALKING

books.author: Hayao Miyazaki
books.description: The prince of a poor land meets a proud girl on his search for a golden grain that might save his land.
books.title: SHUNA'S JOURNEY

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The ninth book in the Dog Man series. After turning in his badge, the canine cop is determined not to just roll over.
books.title: GRIME AND PUNISHMENT

books.author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
books.description: Denji fights the Bat Devil in pursuit of something he isn’t sure will bring him happiness.
books.title: CHAINSAW MAN, VOL. 2

books.author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
books.description: If devil hunters don’t agree to a deal, Denji may need to carve up everything in his way.
books.title: CHAINSAW MAN, VOL. 3

books.author: Aaron Blabey
books.description: The 15th book in the Bad Guys series. A dental visit appears to be worse than one might fear.
books.title: THE BAD GUYS IN OPEN WIDE AND SAY ARRRGH!

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The seventh book in the Dog Man series. A new villain has a bone to pick with Dog Man while Petey the Cat starts a new life.
books.title: FOR WHOM THE BALL ROLLS

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The second book in the Cat Kid Comic Club series. Can this cast of characters understand and appreciate one another’s point of view?
books.title: PERSPECTIVES

books.author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
books.description: Denji, Power and Aki are challenged by a team of assassins.
books.title: CHAINSAW MAN, VOL. 4

books.author: John Grisham
books.description: The second book in the Whistler series. Investigator Lacy Stoltz goes after a serial killer and closes in on a sitting judge.
books.title: THE JUDGE'S LIST

books.description: The daughter of a couple in a loveless marriage is discovered by a British filmmaker and thrust into the public eye.
books.title: INVISIBLE

books.contributor: by James Patterson and Richard DiLallo
books.description: Three thrillers: “French Kiss,” “The Christmas Mystery” and “French Twist.”
books.title: THE PARIS DETECTIVE

books.author: Michael Connelly
books.description: A death on New Year’s Eve, an unsolved murder and a hunt for serial rapists bring Bosch and Ballard back together.
books.title: THE DARK HOURS

books.author: Diana Palmer
books.description: The 11th book in the Wyoming Men series. Abby inherits a property that adjoins one owned by a sheriff who hurt her years ago.
books.title: WYOMING HOMECOMING

books.author: Marc Cameron
books.description: The 21st book in the Jack Ryan series. A shadowy billionaire plans to kidnap the first lady to get President Jack Ryan out of his way.
books.title: TOM CLANCY: CHAIN OF COMMAND

books.author: Danielle Steel
books.description: Six women join the Medical Air Evacuation Transport Squadron during World War II.
books.title: FLYING ANGELS

books.description: A recently divorced woman searching the pockets of an old Santa suit finds a child’s wish that her father return from war.

books.description: Leigh Collier’s past may come to light when she is forced to represent a wealthy man she knows in a rape case.
books.title: FALSE WITNESS

books.description: The 16th book in the Sigma Force series. An unknown force is putting people in a catatonic state in a village in the Congo.

books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.title: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: Sandra Brown
books.description: During Prohibition, Thatcher Hutton and Laurel Plummer wind up on opposite sides of a moonshine war in Texas.

books.description: A special letter to Santa brings about hope, love and second chances for Lindy Carmichael.
